languages.text: Не с первого раза, но вам удается поймать юркий сервочереп и нацарапать на одном из свитков в его механической клешне свои примерные координаты. Шифр, что известен лишь среди высших офицеров командования, должен убедить кого-то из вашей свиты отправить за вами подмогу. После нескольких команд, приписанных лишь личности Лорд-капитана, сервочереп устремляется ввысь — и исчезает в одной из вентиляционных шахт.

traits.locale_text: Не с первого раза, но вам удается поймать юркий сервочереп и нацарапать на одном из свитков в его механической клешне свои примерные координаты. Шифр, что известен лишь среди высших офицеров командования, должен убедить Сенешаля или Мастера Вокса отправить за вами подмогу. После нескольких команд, приписанных лишь личности Лорд-капитана, сервочереп устремляется ввысь — и исчезает в одной из вентиляционных шахт.

languages.text: It takes you several attempts to catch one of the servo-skulls zipping around the bay. You scribble your approximate coordinates on one of the scrolls in its mechanical claw. The code, known only to the highest-ranking officers, ought to convince someone from your retinue to send help. After giving several commands that can only be issued by the Lord Captain personally, you release the servo-skull and it zooms upward, disappearing into a ventilation shaft.
languages.original_text: Не с первого раза, но вам удается поймать юркий сервочереп и нацарапать на одном из свитков в его механической клешне свои примерные координаты. Шифр, что известен лишь среди высших офицеров командования, должен убедить кого-то из вашей свиты отправить за вами подмогу. После нескольких команд, приписанных лишь личности Лорд-капитана, сервочереп устремляется ввысь — и исчезает в одной из вентиляционных шахт.

traits.locale_text: Catching a nimble servo-skull takes several attempts. You scribble your approximate coordinates on one of the scrolls in its mechanical claw. The code known only to the highest commanding officers ought to convince someone from your retinue to send help. After several commands only issuable by the Lord Captain in person, the servo-skull zooms upward and disappears into a ventilation shaft.

Catching a nimble servo-skull takes several attempts. You scribble your approximate coordinates on one of the scrolls in its mechanical claw. The code known only to the highest commanding officers ought to convince someone from your retinue to send help. After several commands only issuable by the Lord Captain in person, the servo-skull zooms upward and disappears into a ventilation shaft.

Catching a nimble servo-skull takes several attempts. You scribble your approximate coordinates on one of the scrolls in its mechanical claw. The code, known only to the highest commanding officers, ought to convince someone from your retinue to send help. After several commands only issuable by the Lord Captain in person, the servo-skull zooms upward and disappears into a ventilation shaft.

It takes the Rogue Trader several attempts to catch one of the servo-skulls zipping around the bay. {mf|He|She} scribbles {mf|his|her} approximate coordinates on one of the scrolls in its mechanical claw. The code, known only to the highest-ranking officers, ought to convince someone from {mf|his|her} retinue to send help. After giving several commands that can only be issued by the Lord Captain personally, the Rogue Trader releases the servo-skull and it zooms upward, disappearing into a ventilation shaft.

It takes the Rogue Trader several attempts to catch one of the servo-skulls zipping around the bay. {mf|He|She} scribbles {mf|his|her} approximate coordinates on one of the scrolls in its mechanical claw. The code, known only to the highest-ranking officers, ought to convince someone from {mf|his|her} retinue to send help. After giving several commands that can only be issued by the Lord Captain personally, the Rogue Trader releases the servo-skull and it zooms upward, disappearing into a ventilation shaft.

It takes you several attempts to catch one of the servo-skulls zipping around the bay. You scribble your approximate coordinates on one of the scrolls in its mechanical claw. The code, known only to the highest-ranking officers, ought to convince someone from your retinue to send help. After giving several commands that can only be issued by the Lord Captain personally, you release the servo-skull and it zooms upward, disappearing into a ventilation shaft.

languages.text: 你尝试了好几次，才抓到一颗在甲板上快速穿行的伺服头骨。你掰开了伺服头骨的机械爪，在其中一个卷轴上写下了你的大致坐标与代码。这个代码只有最高级别的官员才知道，应该足以说服你的随行人员派人来帮忙。你下达了几个只有领主舰长才能亲自发布的命令，之后放开了伺服头骨。伺服头骨向上方飞去，消失在通风井里。
languages.original_text: It takes you several attempts to catch one of the servo-skulls zipping around the bay. You scribble your approximate coordinates on one of the scrolls in its mechanical claw. The code, known only to the highest-ranking officers, ought to convince someone from your retinue to send help. After giving several commands that can only be issued by the Lord Captain personally, you release the servo-skull and it zooms upward, disappearing into a ventilation shaft.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人尝试了好几次，才抓到一颗在甲板上快速穿行的伺服头骨。{mf|他|她}掰开了伺服头骨的机械爪，在其中一个卷轴上写下了{mf|他|她}的大致坐标与代码。这个代码只有最高级别的官员才知道，应该足以说服{mf|他|她}的随行人员派人来帮忙。行商浪人下达了几个只有舰长大人才能亲自发布的命令，之后放开了伺服头骨。伺服头骨向上方飞去，消失在通风井里。

languages.text: Necesitas varios intentos para atrapar a uno de los servocráneos que corretean por la bahía. Garabateas tus coordenadas aproximadas en uno de los pergaminos de su garra metálica. El código que usas, que solo conocen los oficiales de mayor rango, debería convencer a algún miembro de tu séquito para que envíe ayuda. Tras introducir varios comandos para los que solo {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán en persona tiene autoridad, liberas al servocráneo y observas cómo echa a volar, perdiéndose en un conducto de ventilación.
languages.original_text: It takes you several attempts to catch one of the servo-skulls zipping around the bay. You scribble your approximate coordinates on one of the scrolls in its mechanical claw. The code, known only to the highest-ranking officers, ought to convince someone from your retinue to send help. After giving several commands that can only be issued by the Lord Captain personally, you release the servo-skull and it zooms upward, disappearing into a ventilation shaft.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente necesita varios intentos para atrapar a uno de los servocráneos que corretean por la bahía. Garabatea sus coordenadas aproximadas en uno de los pergaminos de su garra metálica. Su código, que solo conocen los oficiales de mayor rango, debería convencer a algún miembro de su séquito para que envíe ayuda. Tras introducir varios comandos para los que solo {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán en persona tiene autoridad, libera al servocráneo y observa cómo echa a volar, perdiéndose en un conducto de ventilación.

languages.text: あなたは、船倉の中を飛び回るサーヴォスカルを一つ捕まえるのに何度か試行錯誤を繰り返した。スカルの機械的な爪にある巻物の一つに、おおよその座標を書き留める。この暗号は最高位の士官だけが知っており、誰かに助けを送るように説得する必要がある。あなたはロード・キャプテン直々にしか出せない命令をいくつか出した後、サーヴォスカルを上方に放ち、スカルは換気シャフトの方に消えていった。
languages.original_text: It takes you several attempts to catch one of the servo-skulls zipping around the bay. You scribble your approximate coordinates on one of the scrolls in its mechanical claw. The code, known only to the highest-ranking officers, ought to convince someone from your retinue to send help. After giving several commands that can only be issued by the Lord Captain personally, you release the servo-skull and it zooms upward, disappearing into a ventilation shaft.

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーは、船倉の中を飛び回るサーヴォスカルを一つ捕まえるのに何度か試行錯誤を繰り返した。スカルの機械的な爪にある巻物の一つに、おおよその座標を書き留める。この暗号は最高位の士官だけが知っており、誰かに助けを送るように説得する必要がある。ローグトレーダーはロード・キャプテン直々にしか出せない命令をいくつか出した後、サーヴォスカルを上方に放ち、スカルは換気シャフトの方に消えていった。

languages.text: Nach einigen Fehlversuchen gelingt es {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin}, einen der Servoschädel zu fangen, die durch das Modul flitzen. {mf|Er|Sie} krakelt {mf|seine|ihre} ungefähren Koordinaten auf eine der Schriftrollen in der mechanischen Klaue des Schädels. Der Code, der nur den ranghöchsten Offizieren vertraut ist, sollte jemanden aus dem Gefolge {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} überzeugen, Hilfe zu schicken. Nachdem {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} mehrere Befehle erteilt hat, die nur vom Lord Captain persönlich erteilt werden dürfen, lässt {mf|er|sie} den Servoschädel los und er flitzt geradewegs in einen Lüftungsschacht und nach oben.
languages.original_text: It takes the Rogue Trader several attempts to catch one of the servo-skulls zipping around the bay. {mf|He|She} scribbles {mf|his|her} approximate coordinates on one of the scrolls in its mechanical claw. The code, known only to the highest-ranking officers, ought to convince someone from {mf|his|her} retinue to send help. After giving several commands that can only be issued by the Lord Captain personally, the Rogue Trader releases the servo-skull and it zooms upward, disappearing into a ventilation shaft.

traits.locale_text: Nach einigen Fehlversuchen gelingt es {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin}, einen der Servoschädel zu fangen, die durch das Modul flitzen. {mf|Er|Sie} krakelt {mf|seine|ihre} ungefähren Koordinaten auf eine der Schriftrollen in der mechanischen Klaue des Schädels. Der Code, der nur den ranghöchsten Offizieren vertraut ist, sollte jemanden aus dem Gefolge {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} überzeugen, Hilfe zu schicken. Nachdem {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} mehrere Befehle erteilt hat, die nur vom Lord Captain persönlich erteilt werden dürfen, lässt {mf|er|sie} den Servoschädel los und er flitzt geradewegs in einen Lüftungsschacht und nach oben.

languages.text: Après plusieurs tentatives, Vous parvenez à attraper l'un des servocrânes qui arpentent la baie. Vous griffonnez vos coordonnées approximatives sur l'un des parchemins de sa mâchoire mécanique. Le code, uniquement connu des officiers de haut rang, devrait pousser quelqu'un de sa suite à envoyer de l'aide. Après avoir donné plusieurs ordres ne pouvant être délivrés que par le seigneur-capitaine en personne, vous relâchez le servocrâne qui s'envole avant de disparaître dans un conduit d'aération.
languages.original_text: It takes you several attempts to catch one of the servo-skulls zipping around the bay. You scribble your approximate coordinates on one of the scrolls in its mechanical claw. The code, known only to the highest-ranking officers, ought to convince someone from your retinue to send help. After giving several commands that can only be issued by the Lord Captain personally, you release the servo-skull and it zooms upward, disappearing into a ventilation shaft.

traits.locale_text: Après plusieurs tentatives, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} parvient à attraper l'un des servocrânes qui arpentent la baie. {mf|Il|elle} griffonne ses coordonnées approximatives sur l'un des parchemins de sa mâchoire mécanique. Le code, uniquement connu des officiers de haut rang, devrait pousser quelqu'un de sa suite à envoyer de l'aide. Après avoir donné plusieurs ordres ne pouvant être délivrés que par {mf|le|la} seigneur-capitaine en personne, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} relâche le servocrâne qui s'envole avant de disparaître dans un conduit d'aération.
